ValidationRule.description: This validation rule will help to restrict editing closed case
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(ISNEW()),OR(AND($Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' ,NOT($Permission.CCI_Supervisor_Permission) ,OR(AND(NOT(ISCHANGED( Status )),TEXT(Status) == 'Closed' ),AND( ISCHANGED( Status ), ISPICKVAL (PRIORVALUE(Status),'Closed')))),AND(NOT(ISCHANGED( Status )),TEXT(Status) == 'Closed')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot edit a closed case. Only supervisor and above can open the case.
